name: CHAITANYA RURAL DEVELOPMENT SOCIETY
briefDescription: Implemented Projects1.Ligal Litracy Training for Rural Woman Chaitanya Rural Development Society was conducted 58 Legal awareness programmes in Haveri District in this training we covered 8088 women.  with the funding  of National legal service authority New Delhi. The prog was conducted with the support & co-operation of National Legal service Authority & District &Taluk  Legal service Authorities. This prog given awareness to rural women about legal support to the women’s like dowry, drunker, property, mahilya   swathan Kendra. Women & child . working women in industrial having facilities. rules. Adoption method. Death registration. Totally this prog helped to women’s to knew the legal for their protection.  1520 are Minority women are
